taxation.tax_declaration_allow: Tax Declaration is only allowed under the Old Regime
taxation.salary_details_Validation_for_tax_declar: Please ask Admin to create salary details before declaring tax.
taxation.statutory_Validation_for_tax_declaration: Please ask Admin to create statutory details before declaring tax.
taxation.statutory_Validation_for_tax_calculator: Please complete your statutory details to use the Tax Calculator.
taxation.tax_declaraton_only_Old_regime: Tax Declaration is not allowed in New Regime
taxation.tax_declaraton_componant_updated: Income Tax Declaration Component Updated Successfully
taxation.filed_to_tax_declaraton_componant_update: Failed To update Income Tax Declaration Component Update
taxation.componant_already_apprved: This component is already approved/Rejected. You cannot modify it.
taxation.failed_to_update_component: Failed to update the component. Please try again later.
taxation.approved_less_than_applied: Approved amount cannot be more than applied amount.
taxation.approved_less_than_maximum: Approved amount cannot be more than maximum amount.
taxation.approve_amount_positive: Approved amount must be a positive number.
taxation.validation_failed: Validation failed. Please check the inputs.
taxation.verified_less_than_rent: Verified amount must be less than or equal to the declared rent. Example: If rent declared is ₹15,000, verified amount should be ≤ ₹15,000.
taxation.rent_exceeds_limit: Verified rent amount cannot exceed the declared rent.
taxation.landlordPan_required: Landlord PAN is required. Example: ABCDE1234F
taxation.invalid_pan: Landlord PAN is invalid. Valid Sample PAN Format: ABCDE1234F
taxation.verified_amount_positive: Verified amount must be a positive number. Example: 15000
taxation.cityType_required: City type is required. Example: Metro or Non-Metro.
taxation.landlordName_required: Landlord name is required. Example: Mr. Ramesh Kumar
taxation.landlordAddress_required: Landlord address is required. Example: 12/3 MG Road, Bangalore, Karnataka
taxation.failed_to_add_rent_information: Selected Rent Information Can not be add
taxation.failed_to_update_rent_information: Selected Rent Information Can not be update
taxation.amount_exceeded: Approved Amount ({{approvedAmount}}) for {{componentName}} exceeds Maximum Amount ({{maximumAmount}})
taxation.all_hra_updated: All HRA income tax declarations updated successfully
taxation.failed_to_update_bulk_hra: Failed to update bulk HRA declarations
taxation.attachment_name_not_found: Attachment name not found in URL
taxation.attachment_missing: Attachment URL or name is missing
taxation.approve_amount_required: Approved Amount is required when status is Approved.
taxation.verified_amount_required: Verified Amount is required when status is Approved.
taxation.no_components_available: No components available for this section.
taxation.disclaimer_content: The above calculator is illustrative and designed to enable Employee to get a quick view toward Old vs New Regime tax calculation. Please follow your discretion in deciding which plan suits you the best. The data shown above does not get saved anywhere. The Actual Tax calculation could be different based on actual & additional variable payment and paydays, if applicable, which will be part of your final respective month payroll cycle.
taxation.disclaimer_content2: The above calculator is illustrative and designed to enable Employee to get a quick view toward Old vs New Regime tax calculation. Please follow your discretion in deciding which plan suits you the best. The data shown above does not get saved anywhere. The Actual Tax calculation could be different based on actual & additional variable payment and paydays, if applicable, which will be part of your final respective month payroll cycle.
taxation.applied_amount_exceeds_max: Applied amount cannot exceed maximum amount.
taxation.start_end_spaces_not_allowed: Start and end spaces are not allowed
taxation.maximum_amount_required: Maximum amount is required, Enter 0 for no Limit.
taxation.digits_only: Maximum amount must contain only digits.
